100% Free & Private

Free Client-Side Tools

A collection of useful developer tools that run entirely in your browser. No uploads, no servers, no tracking. Your data stays on your device.

Available Tools

Favicon Converter

Convert images to ICO, PNG, Apple Touch Icons & Android Chrome icons

QR Code Generator

Generate QR codes for text, URLs, WiFi & vCards with custom colors

TLS Certificate Generator

Generate self-signed TLS/SSL certificates with RSA or ECDSA keys

JSON & YAML Formatter

Format, validate & convert between JSON and YAML formats

CIDR Calculator

Calculate IPv4 & IPv6 subnets, detect overlaps & find available ranges

Coming Soon

Image Compressor

Soon

Compress images without quality loss

Color Converter

Soon

Convert between HEX, RGB, HSL

Password Generator

Soon

Generate secure random passwords

100% Private

All tools run locally in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

No Sign-up

Use any tool instantly without creating an account or signing in.

Open Source

All code is open source and available on GitHub. Contribute or self-host.
